taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For J. R. Gowen, English collector in Assam]

bio:treatment.discussion: Species 30 or more (1 in the flora):

references.reference: Brown, P. M. 2000d. Govenia floridana (Orchidaceae), a new species endemic to southern Florida, U.S.A. N. Amer. Native Orchid J. 6: 231–238.
Correll, D. S. 1947. Revision of the genus Govenia. Lloydia 10: 218–278.
Fawcett, W. and A. B. Rendle. 1910–1936. Flora of Jamaica…. 5 vols. London. Vol. 1, p. 113.
Greenwood, E. W. 1982b. Govenia in Mexico, an introductory note. Orquidea (Mexico City) 8: 114–120.
Greenwood, E. W. 1991. The Florida Govenia. Amer. Orchid Soc. Bull. 69: 867–869.
